passives.name: Promise
passives.effects: While your ''Promised'' ally is {{tt|tethered|1250 units, center to edge}} to you, gain {{as|ability power}} equal to {{as|20% of ''Promised'' ally's AP}}, and grant your ''Promised'' ally {{as|ability haste}} equal to {{as|20% of your ability haste}}. ''Increases and decreases to each teammate's stats recalculate this effect.''

active.name: Promise
active.effects: Make a ''Promise'' to the target allied champion, forming a {{tip|tether}} between you and them.

effects_structured.raw: While tethered to your Promised ally (1250 range), gain AP equal to 20% of their AP.
While tethered, grant your Promised ally ability haste equal to 20% of your ability haste.
Stat changes recalculate the tether bonuses dynamically.
Active: Make a Promise to an allied champion, forming a tether.
